location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with crayon on paperDimensions:329 x 219 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn rough sketch map dated 3 August 1929 attached to a report by Harold Dickson on Kuwait relations with Ibn Sa’ud (folios 217-228).Shows tribal areas along Kuwait border and Hasa coast, featuring Mutair, Awazim, and Ajman with the old Kuwait boundary marked in red ink. Includes a note on territory dispute in the bottom margin.
